error.message: Fetching class constant class of deprecated class Drupal\views\Plugin\views\field\Field. Deprecated in drupal:8.3.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\views\Plugin\views\field\EntityField instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to layout_plugin_views.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
